FuncDef:
The service-instance-group command binds a NAT64 instance to a service-instance-group instance group.
The undo service-instance-group command deletes the binding between a NAT64 instance and a service-instance-group instance group.
By default, a NAT64 instance is bound to no service-location instance group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service-instance-group instance group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To bind a NAT64 instance to a service-instance-group instance group, run the service-instance-group command. This command helps properly transmit NAT64 services to a service board.
Prerequisites
A service-instance-group instance group has been created and bound to a service board.
